languages.text: {n}Старик похож на человека, но чешуйчатые роговые наросты, тянущиеся от переносицы к лысой макушке вздутой головы, гротескные скулы и черные когти, венчающие мясистые пальцы, выдают в нем генетического выродка. Брызгая черной слюной, старик скрежещет:{/n} "Ты пролил{mf||а} кровь Конгрегации... Ты оскорбил{mf||а} Его избранных чистейших детей! Ты... Ерети{mf|к|чка}!"

{n}The old man before you resembles a human being, but the scaled bony growths going from the bridge of his nose to the top of his bloated, hairless head, the grotesque cheekbones, and the black claws on his meaty fingers leave no doubt that this creature is a genetic aberration. He utters in a creaking voice, black spittle spraying from his mouth,{/n} "You have spilt the blood of the Congregation. You have offended the purest of His chosen children! You... heretic!"
languages.original_text: {n}Старик похож на человека, но чешуйчатые роговые наросты, тянущиеся от переносицы к лысой макушке вздутой головы, гротескные скулы и черные когти, венчающие мясистые пальцы, выдают в нем генетического выродка. Брызгая черной слюной, старик скрежещет:{/n} "Ты пролил{mf||а} кровь Конгрегации... Ты оскорбил{mf||а} Его избранных чистейших детей! Ты... Ерети{mf|к|чка}!"

He utters in a creaking voice, black spittle spraying from his mouth,{/n} "You have spilt the blood of the Brood. You have offended the purest of His chosen children! You... heretic!"

languages.text: {n}Le vieil homme qui se tient devant vous ressemble à un être humain, mais les excroissances osseuses écaillées qui vont de l'arête de son nez au sommet de son crâne gonflé et glabre, ses pommettes grotesques et les griffes noires sur ses doigts charnus ne laissent aucun doute sur sa véritable nature : cette créature est une aberration génétique.{/n} « Vous avez répandu le sang de la Congrégation, {n}dit-il d'une voix grinçante en crachant de la salive noire.{/n} Vous avez offensé le plus pur de Ses élus ! Hérétiques ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The old man before you resembles a human being, but the scaled bony growths going from the bridge of his nose to the top of his bloated, hairless head, the grotesque cheekbones, and the black claws on his meaty fingers leave no doubt that this creature is a genetic aberration. He utters in a creaking voice, black spittle spraying from his mouth,{/n} "You have spilt the blood of the Congregation. You have offended the purest of His chosen children! You... heretic!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieil homme qui se tient devant vous ressemble à un être humain, mais les excroissances osseuses écaillées qui vont de l'arête de son nez au sommet de son crâne gonflé et glabre, ses pommettes grotesques et les griffes noires sur ses doigts charnus ne laissent aucun doute sur sa véritable nature : cette créature est une aberration génétique.{/n} « Vous avez répandu le sang de la Congrégation, {n}dit-il d'une voix grinçante en crachant de la salive noire.{/n} Vous avez offensé le plus pur de Ses élus ! Hérétiques ! »

languages.text: {n}El anciano ante ti se asemeja a un ser humano, pero los tumores escamosos y huesudos que le surgen desde el puente nasal hasta lo alto de su cabeza hinchada y calva, los pómulos grotescos y las garras negras de sus dedos carnosos evidencian que esta criatura es una aberración genética. Con voz chirriante y esputos negros, masculla:{/n} «Has derramado la sangre de la Congregación. ¡Has ofendido a los más puros de Sus hijos elegidos! Eres un{mf||a}... ¡hereje!».
languages.original_text: {n}The old man before you resembles a human being, but the scaled bony growths going from the bridge of his nose to the top of his bloated, hairless head, the grotesque cheekbones, and the black claws on his meaty fingers leave no doubt that this creature is a genetic aberration. He utters in a creaking voice, black spittle spraying from his mouth,{/n} "You have spilt the blood of the Congregation. You have offended the purest of His chosen children! You... heretic!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano ante ti se asemeja a un ser humano, pero los tumores escamosos y huesudos que le surgen desde el puente nasal hasta lo alto de su cabeza hinchada y calva, los pómulos grotescos y las garras negras de sus dedos carnosos evidencian que esta criatura es una aberración genética. Con voz chirriante y esputos negros, masculla:{/n} «Has derramado la sangre de la Congregación. ¡Has ofendido a los más puros de Sus hijos elegidos! Eres un{mf||a}... ¡hereje!».

languages.text: {n}你面前的老人看起来像个人类，但他浮肿的秃头上长满了鳞片状的骨头，一直延伸到鼻梁处。他的颧骨奇形怪状，肉乎乎的手指上还长着黑色的利爪。毫无疑问，这家伙是个怪物。他用颤抖的声音开了口，口中喷溅着黑色的唾液。{/n}“你让祂的教团成员流血了！你伤害了祂最纯洁的选民！你……你这个异端分子！”
languages.original_text: {n}The old man before you resembles a human being, but the scaled bony growths going from the bridge of his nose to the top of his bloated, hairless head, the grotesque cheekbones, and the black claws on his meaty fingers leave no doubt that this creature is a genetic aberration. He utters in a creaking voice, black spittle spraying from his mouth,{/n} "You have spilt the blood of the Congregation. You have offended the purest of His chosen children! You... heretic!"

traits.locale_text: {n}你面前的老人看起来像个人类，但他浮肿的秃头上长满了鳞片状的骨头，一直延伸到鼻梁处。他的颧骨奇形怪状，肉乎乎的手指上还长着黑色的利爪。毫无疑问，这家伙是个怪物。他用颤抖的声音开了口，口中喷溅着黑色的唾液。{/n}“你让祂的教团成员流血了！你伤害了祂最纯洁的选民！你……你这个异端分子！”

languages.text: {n}目の前の老人は人間に似ているが、鼻筋から丸く毛のない頭頂部にかけて鱗のような骨が生えていて、頬骨は気持ち悪く、太った指の爪は黒い。この生き物がこの生き物が遺伝的忌まわしい存在であることは疑いようがない。口から黒い唾液を吹き出しながら、きしむような声でこう言ったであることは疑いようがない。口から黒い唾液を吹き出しながら、きしむような声でこう言った。{/n}「お前は会衆の血を流した！純粋な子友達を汚した！この…異端者め！」
languages.original_text: {n}The old man before you resembles a human being, but the scaled bony growths going from the bridge of his nose to the top of his bloated, hairless head, the grotesque cheekbones, and the black claws on his meaty fingers leave no doubt that this creature is a genetic aberration. He utters in a creaking voice, black spittle spraying from his mouth,{/n} "You have spilt the blood of the Congregation. You have offended the purest of His chosen children! You... heretic!"

traits.locale_text: {n}目の前の老人は人間に似ているが、鼻筋から丸く毛のない頭頂部にかけて鱗のような骨が生えていて、頬骨は気持ち悪く、太った指の爪は黒い。この生き物がこの生き物が遺伝的忌まわしい存在であることは疑いようがない。口から黒い唾液を吹き出しながら、きしむような声でこう言ったであることは疑いようがない。口から黒い唾液を吹き出しながら、きしむような声でこう言った。{/n}「お前は会衆の血を流した！純粋な子友達を汚した！この…異端者め！」

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann vor dir ähnelt einem Menschen, doch die mit Schuppen besetzten knöchernen Auswüchse, die von seiner Nasenwurzel bis hinauf auf seinen aufgeblähten, haarlosen Kopf führen, die grotesken Wangenknochen und die schwarzen Krallen an seinen fleischigen Fingern lassen keinen Zweifel: Diese Kreatur ist ein genetische Abscheulichkeit.{/n} "Ihr habt das Blut der Kongregation vergossen", {n}sagt er mit krächzender Stimme, schwarzen Speichel versprühend.{/n} "Ihr habt die Reinsten seiner auserwählten Kinder beleidigt! Ihr ... {mf|Ketzer|Ketzerin}!"
languages.original_text: {n}The old man before you resembles a human being, but the scaled bony growths going from the bridge of his nose to the top of his bloated, hairless head, the grotesque cheekbones, and the black claws on his meaty fingers leave no doubt that this creature is a genetic aberration. He utters in a creaking voice, black spittle spraying from his mouth,{/n} "You have spilt the blood of the Congregation. You have offended the purest of His chosen children! You... heretic!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der alte Mann vor dir ähnelt einem Menschen, doch die mit Schuppen besetzten knöchernen Auswüchse, die von seiner Nasenwurzel bis hinauf auf seinen aufgeblähten, haarlosen Kopf führen, die grotesken Wangenknochen und die schwarzen Krallen an seinen fleischigen Fingern lassen keinen Zweifel: Diese Kreatur ist ein genetische Abscheulichkeit. "Ihr habt das Blut der Kongregation vergossen"{/n}, sagt er mit krächzender Stimme, schwarzen Speichel versprühend. Ihr habt die Reinsten seiner auserwählten Kinder beleidigt! Ihr ... {mf|Ketzer|Ketzerin}!"

languages.text: {n}Önündeki yaşlı adam, bir insanı andırsa da burun köprüsünden şişkin ve kel kafasına doğru çıkan pullu kemiksi yapılar, grotesk elmacık kemikleri ve dolgun parmaklarındaki siyah pençeler; bu yaratığın genetik bir sapkı olduğuna dair en ufak bir şüphe bırakmıyor. Ağzından siyah salyalar saçıyor, çatırdayan bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Cemaatin kanını döktün. O'nun seçilmiş çocuklarının en saf olanlarını öfkelendirdin! Seni... Kâfir!"
languages.original_text: {n}The old man before you resembles a human being, but the scaled bony growths going from the bridge of his nose to the top of his bloated, hairless head, the grotesque cheekbones, and the black claws on his meaty fingers leave no doubt that this creature is a genetic aberration. He utters in a creaking voice, black spittle spraying from his mouth,{/n} "You have spilt the blood of the Congregation. You have offended the purest of His chosen children! You... heretic!"
